choices: Made everyone a clone of someone
Change their language to something unusual
Give everyone the ability to separate at a certain point
1.content:
Amanda couldn't sleep. She had just finished watching her favourite show, and it was close to midnight. She normally wouldn't stay up that late, but it was Friday night, so she had little to worry about for tomorrow. She was planning a trip to the city with her housemates, which she looked forward to. She was also excited about going to Scienceworks, as the Star Wars exhibit was there. Whilst David and Rachel only marginally shared her love of sci-fi, they enjoyed Star Wars as much as the next person.

Suddenly, a bright light shot through a gap in her curtains. Could it be the moon, she thought. But this was so bright it was almost as if the light was on. Amanda then picked up her glasses off the bedside table. She normally wore contacts, but in this kind of a situation, glasses would have to do. She crept out her door, careful not to wake up David and Rachel. Rachel was her best friend, but was more feminine. She had been dating David for almost a year now. David was a film buff, and had a large collection of DVD's. Amanda got along with him just fine, but she wasn't willing to wake them up.

By the time she got outside, the light was gone. However, she looked down and saw a package. She picked it up and saw it was addressed to her. There was a card attached, which read "We have been watching you, and we know you want a change in your life. We have access to technology far advanced of humanity, and believe you would be deserving of this device. You have no need to worry about this device falling into the wrong hands, as it is pre-programmed so that only you can use it. Use it wisely, though."

Was this a joke? She went up to her room and opened the package, and found a strange device. It looked like an enlarged iPod touch. There was a manual to go with it.

"Congratulations on the acquirement of your new Reality Warper! With this device, you have the power to alter the world in your own image. Regress adults to children, shrink people down to the size of a matchstick, speak in a different language, and much more."

Amanda was still skeptical, but at the same time, liked the idea. But she knew it would have to wait until morning, and she had already decided on what to change...
1.title: A new package

choices: decided to play along for the moment
programmed the device so David and Rachel weren't affected by mind control
11.content:
Amanda got up around 7:30. She wasn't due to leave for the city until around 11:30. Now seemed to be a good time as any other to test out the device. She had to read the documentation firsthand, however.

"To set up your device, mount it on a wall. This will make the device change all reality within your building".

She wondered how she could place it on her wall. There were no holes for screws or nails. The manual didn't seem to specify how to mount it. She guessed the only way to find out how to mount it was to simply place it on her bedroom wall. She placed the device on her wall, which subsequently seemed to turn into liquid. It engulfed the device, but it still felt like a concrete wall to her hands, which did not get engulfed. After a few seconds, the device surfaced, and it appeared to be attached to her wall. It was now turned on. There were several selections.

Invisible
Disappear
Copy
Size
Length
Animal
Age
Sound/language
Animation
Mind control
Affects

She touched the word "Invisible" and another screen came up. There were two selections.

Whole body
Separate parts

She pressed the selection "Separate Parts" and brought up "Head" and "Body". She read the manual again.

"Reality can change a person's whole body, or just certain parts. For instance, to change the reality of your head, press the word 'Head' once. To change the reality of parts of your head, such as your hair, mouth, ears, etc., press 'Head' twice."

Amanda decided to change her whole body, and pressed an arrow pointing right near the bottom of the screen. She then pressed the selection "Whole Body". The words were then highlighted in green. However, Amanda felt nothing. Perhaps a look in the mirror might help. She went into the bathroom, looked in the mirror, and sure enough, she could not see herself. All she could see was her pajamas, standing there, empty. Where her hands, feet, and head should have been, there was empty space. Her pajama pants appeared to be floating. She raised her arms and waved them around. In the mirror, the sleeves of her pajama top repeated the exact same actions. She clapped her hands, rubbed them together, rubbed them against her face. They were still there, but were simply invisible.

She picked up her toothbrush, and sure enough, it appeared to be floating near her sleeve. She tried to put it in her mouth, but seemed to be touching thin air when she did so. She realized now that whilst she could touch tangible objects, they could not touch her.

She figured that David and Rachel must be up by now. She went to the living room, and found Rachel's nightgown sitting on the couch, watching television. It too was filled out as if she was in it.

"Morning Amanda", the nightgown said.
"Oh my god, you're invisible too! Listen, I can explain...", said Amanda.
"Explain what? I've always been invisible and so have you. Hasn't bothered you until just now."
"No, I got an alien device, and warped reality."
"Wow, you sound like a kid. I'm not exactly Einstein, but I know that this is what normal people look like."

Amanda looked up at the television. It was showing some kiddie sitcom, probably Wizards of Waverly Place. All the characters in the show were invisible, their clothes were moving as if people were inside them. They could still be heard. There was a DVD case on the table. The people photographed on that were also invisible.

"Really, we're supposed to look like this?" asked Amanda.
"Look out the window if you're unsure," said Rachel.

She looked out onto the road, and could see various people walking down the street. It looked normal, but they were also invisible. Amanda then went outside, and as soon as she exited the door frame, she noticed that she was back to her normal form. She could see herself again. The people outside were also visible. She went back inside, and became invisible again.

"Are you sure we're supposed to be invisible?"
"Yes, I've made that perfectly clear."
"Why don't we take a look outside?"

Amanda grabbed Rachel by the arm and took her outside. They then both reverted to their true, visible form.

"See?" Amanda said, pointing to various people. "That's our true form."
"No shit, Sherlock."

Rachel went back inside, and reverted to her invisible form.

"Did you see?"
"Yeah, you dragged me outside to point out the obvious."
"But we became visible again"
"No, I don't remember changing form"

Amanda stormed off to her bedroom. She had a read of the manual.

"Normally, people affected by this change will accept it as if they were always like that. However, you can program it so they can feel the change. Select 'Mind Control', and a list of names will come up. These consist of people who live or work in the building, as well as regular guests. Names highlighted in green will be people affected by the changes, but will not feel it. Press their names and the highlight will be removed, thus making them able to feel the changes."

Amanda...
11.title: The next day...

choices: decided to remain invisible for the moment
111.content:
Amanda thought "Nah, maybe I should leave the mind control as it is and play along for the moment. This should be funny, hearing Rachel's reactions as if these weird changes were normal."

She skimmed through the manual, finding out that the "copy" option could give everybody multiple body parts, as well as turn everybody into clones of one person. She also seemed interested in the "animation" option. She had enjoyed cartoons since she was a little kid, and so did Rachel.

She decided that if she was going to play along, perhaps it would be best if she didn't tell her friends about the device. If she tried to demonstrate, they would not believe her.

Amanda then decided on another mode. She...

enjoy it for now, she can wait

"ugh.. sorry amanda, but we have to leave now if we want to do all that fun stuff today because our appointments were pushed to in the next half hour." amanda was very upset because the device saud it could only work inside a building with her in it but the manual naturaly flipped back to the beggining where it said, "for portable use, just place any device that uses text, touch screen, or voice reconition and a screen onto this device and they will fuse into that same device but with the same programming as this one. in doing so, you still may use it the way it was before so but you may not have to be in the building for it to remain altered and the device may be used anywhere without the need to attach. doing this will also unlock the "custom affect keyboard" option. amanda was pleased with what she read and then decided
1111.title: decided to remain invisible for the moment

1112.content:
Amanda selected the clone option. She then selected "multiple parts". She thought back to various photoshopped images and ads...

Perhaps she could give everybody extra arms? Or legs? She chuckled at the thought of giving herself, Rachel and other women extra boobs.

She ultimately decided on...
1112.title: gave everybody multiple body parts

11122.content:
Amanda read the manual.

"Up to 100 extra body parts can be added in this reality. The addition of extra legs will also mean the addition of extra sexual organs. For example, if humanity is given three legs, they will have two sets of sexual organs, four legs means three sets of sexual organs, etc. Bear in mind that humanity will not become centaurs if given four or more legs, but will have their legs lined up as in a normal reality. Centaur transformations will be found in Mythical.

People that are unaffected by the mind control will find it difficult to walk at first, but hopefully should learn quickly.

Body parts that exist as multiples in normal reality can also be subtracted. The body parts will merge into one."

Amanda thought about it. Perhaps something simple like three or four legs would be a better idea. She also found the prospect of being one-legged interesting...
11122.title: legs

choices: Play with the reality warper some more.
111222.content:
First off, Amanda turned off the invisibility from the device. She was already going to have to relearn how to walk, being able to see where you are going would probably be an important step. Next, she went to the "legs" part of the multiple body parts to find a slider to control the amount of legs. She swiped the slider to the left and the monitor read "1".

Just like when she had turned on invisibility, she didn't feel any different, but looking down, things were very different. Her jeans (or would it be jean?) only had one leg hole straight down the middle. Her foot too had changed, so that her middle toe was the longest, and her foot was nearly symmetrical.

She got up, only to fall back down. With only one leg, her center of gravity had changed, and she didn't have the second leg to help support herself. She got up again (this time holding on to a table), and took a few practice hops before making her way to her room. Once inside, she took off her pants (pant?) to get a look at how else her body had changed. Examining where your crotch used to be, her pussy now was in roughly the same place, but attached directly to her leg, her anus done in a similar method in the back.

What should Amanda do now?
111222.title: One leg

Amanda picked the "eyes" option. She skimmed through the instructions. She noticed a paragraph.

Amanda was immediately reminded of Leela from Futurama, and how the character was a cyclops. She thought that perhaps it would be a better idea to turn everyone into cyclopses rather than give everybody extra eyes.

After mulling it over for a minute, she decided to give everyone...

Amanda chose to have one eye. After pressing enter, she went to the bathroom to check her reflection.

It wasn't quite what she expected. She had one eye in the center of her forehead, just above her nose. But it was of the proportion of the average human eye. Not quite the one large eye she was used to seeing. She then remembered that there were size options as well.

She then...
111231.title: One eye

1112312.content:
She went back to her room and chose the size option. She then picked "Body Parts", then "Eye". Getting out a pocket mirror, she carefully adjusted the proportion until it was to her liking. There. Now she looked more like Leela from Futurama. With any luck, so did everyone else in this universe.

She went back to the living room, and sure enough, Rachel was doing what she normally did on Saturday mornings if she managed to have gotten up by that time. Except she was now a cyclops.

"Hey, sorry about before." said Amanda. "I just had a really weird dream. You know, one of those ones where you think you're awake, but then the dream starts up again?"
"That's okay," said Rachel.
"You wanna watch something before we go?", asked Amanda. "I think we could do better than this. Futurama, maybe?"
"Sure" said Rachel.

Amanda picked up her copy of Futurama. Most of the characters all had one eye, except for Leela, who had...
1112312.title: Warped reality to make her eye bigger

1113.content:
Amanda decided on the animation option. There was a whole list of several cartoons she knew and loved. There was also an option entitled "Live action cartoon" She read the manual.

"In the animation reality, all live action reality will become animated cartoon in the style of your choice. Conversely, all animated media will become live action. Live action cartoon is a reality where the world is in live action, but there are cartoon physics as seen in various Looney Tunes cartoons".

Amanda remembered some of her favourite cartoons. Her earliest memories of cartoons were the Looney Tunes. She also enjoyed Futurama and various other drawn animation. Then she remembered various stop-motion animation she had seen in such films as Coraline and the Wallace and Gromit films.

Ultimately, she chose...
1113.title: chose the animation option

112.content:
Amanda felt that she needed to discuss this device with some people, and the only way to do that would be to remove the mind control effect on them. She would start by doing this with Rachel and David. She brought up the "Mind Control" menu, and saw her name, along with David and Rachel's, followed by a short list of people who frequently visited. David and Rachel's names were highlighted in green, but she touched them, making them able to feel the changes.

After a few seconds, she heard screaming coming from the living room. Amanda realized Rachel must have found out about the reality warping and quickly pressed the reset button. She then bolted to the living room to find Rachel hyperventilating.

"My hands...they disappeared...and then they came back. What the fuck happened?", asked Rachel.
"I'll explain it in a bit. Are you all right?"
"Yeah...yeah, I'm fine now."

David came into the room, wearing a robe. "My god, Rachel, are you okay?"
"She's fine, I'll explain. Last night, I got some sort of reality warping device," explained Amanda.
"Reality warping?", asked Rachel.
"Yeah. I program in how people change, then all people are like that. I made all people invisible, even ones on TV and on photos, but when I tried to explain it, you believed it was normal. So I turned off the mind control that you were under."
"Whew...well, that's a relief, knowing you have control over it. Cool, we should do something like this before we go to the city." said Rachel.
"Thing is, it only affects reality while we're inside this house. The moment we step out, reality goes back to normal, we change back."
"Maybe it's portable or something," said David.

Amanda went up to her room again, and tried to pull the device off the wall by the side. Nothing happened. She read the manual again.

"To remove the device from its place on the wall, press the red button at the top. This will turn off the device, and all changes will revert to normal. For portability, press the button again, and it will fold into a more portable form. To have the device revert to its usual form, press the button again."

Amanda did as the manual said. Once it had folded up, it appeared to have taken the form of an iPod nano, except there was a red button where the screen should have been. She noticed a little switch at the bottom, and flicked it to the opposite position. Nothing happened. She pressed the red button. Nothing happened. She then realized it locked the device so it would accidentally be activated in her pocket.

She went back to the living room.

"Well?", asked Rachel.
"Yeah, I can make it portable. But I think you have to place it on a wall for it to be on."
"Hey, we've got like three and a half hours before we have to go. Let's have a little fun."

Amanda then unlocked the device, made it its regular size again, and mounted it on the living room wall.

"Well, what do you want to try out?"
112.title: Her friends find out the truth

1121.content:
"Well, what do you want to try out?" asked Amanda.

Rachel quickly answered "size" which was greeted by a rolling of Dave's eyes. Rachel was slightly overweight, and even though it looked really good on her, she always obsessed about losing weight. David had always told her not to worry about it. In fact, he thought she wouldn't be nearly as hot if she lost some weight.

Amanda also struggled with her weight, but she was more confident in the way she looked (which was pretty damn good). Amanda went to the main menu and pressed SIZE which brought up the following options:

Height
Weight
Body Parts

Miscellaneous

Rachel smiled at Amanda and said "I think you know which one to pick".

Amanda pressed the
1121.title: Size

11211.content:
The weight option brought up what could only be described as a quagmire of sub menus, so, not much more different than any other of the options. "Well, looks like I can change the weight of any person on the planet." Or of the whole planet, or the weight of a body part, or whether the weight was fat or just density... or really anything. "Good thing this comes with a user manual written in good English." The thing was, Rachel had been dieting on and off for the better part of three years trying to lose than weight, and it wasn't healthy for her to keep switching up her diet like that. This could be the time to set her right.

"maybe, twenty pounds off, you know, super model sized." In Amanda's hands was the power to change anything, and with a few keystrokes, hidden by her hands from Rachel's and David's eyes, her decision was in, and she pressed enter.
11211.title: Weight option

11221.content:
"Nah, let's just change gender," said Amanda, who broke David of the mind control before warping reality yet again.

She could see clearly then that David was now Rachel's girlfriend, and vice versa. She took out a mirror. Her shoulder-length brown hair had shortened. Rachel's lengthy blonde hair had been reduced to a fauxhawk. Conversely, David's short hair had lengthened into Rachel's style. However, their clothes had remained the same.

"I'm still wearing a nightie? Ewww!!" exclaimed Rachel.
"I thought I programmed it so the mind control wouldn't affect you." said Amanda.
"Yeah, but I know I'm not supposed to wear it. David, it's yours now."
"Fine. We should find out our names in this reality, so we know who people are referring to," said David.

Their voices had pretty much changed as well. Whilst Rachel's voice had been the highest-pitched amongst the group when she was a girl, but now that she was a guy, his voice seemed deeper. Amanda had a relatively high-pitched voice for a guy, whereas she had a rather low-pitched voice for a girl when she was one.

After a shower, and a change of wardrobe, the three of them were ready to go to the city. The three of them had found out their respective names via their ID cards - David was now Dana, Amanda was now Emmanuel, and Rachel was now Raymond. Amanda mostly wore pants, and her wardrobe hadn't changed much. However, Rachel and David's wardrobes had been switched. Rachel now had David's wardrobe, and vice versa. Dana decided to wear a sundress and platform sandals, whilst Ray went for a casual jeans and jacket look.

Emmanuel programmed the device so that when reality went back to normal, his clothes would feminize, and Ray and Dana's clothes would switch.

"I think we should be going about now," said Emmanuel.
"Aw, I like being a girl," grumbled Dana, knowing what was going to happen.

Emmanuel turned off the device, became Amanda again, and placed the compacted device into her pocket. Ray and Dana became Rachel and David again, and had switched clothing with the reality change.

"So what do we do before we go into the city?" asked Amanda.
"Let's go out for morning tea. I'd like to see other people's reactions in a cafe!" said Rachel.
"Nah, I'd prefer to see 'em on the train." said David.

Amanda...

"Nope, Rachel wins the Best Idea contest yet again" said Amanda.

Amanda then typed in Rachel's name.

"Hey, you want everyone to keep their normal clothing, or wear the same outfit as you?" asked Amanda.

"Keep their clothes. I don't wanna get confused." said Rachel.

Amanda then ticked the "retain clothing" box. She then pressed enter.

"Hm. Don't feel any different." said Rachel looking down at herself.

"That's because everyone else is a clone of you. You're the only one unaffected." said a familiar voice.

Rachel looked up. Looking back at her was herself, except dressed in Amanda's clothes. Next to her was another copy, except dressed in David's clothes.

"We're still boyfriend and girlfriend, right?" Rachel-David said. "I know you've tried going the other way."

"Yeah, I'm pretty sure we're still a couple." said the real Rachel. "Hey, we've still got time, why don't we check out what else is unique about this reality."

11221111222.title: turned everybody into clones of Rachel

choices: Observed some more people in this reality
112211112222.content:
Rachel said "I wonder if people act differently in this world since they are all clones of me?"

David smiled and called out for the waitress (still unused to his voice sounding like his girlfriends). As the waitress came over to take their order, Amanda noticed that her name tag no longer said Michelle but now read Rachelle.

David ordered "Hey miss, we'll take two Caffe Lattes and I'll have a Cappucino." The waitress shot him a strange look and said "What is a Cappucino?" David could feel himself becoming slightly impatient "You know. It is the drink you served me a few minutes ago." David pointed down to the drink on the table, but that drink was now an almost empty Caffe Latte.

Rachelle the waitress, sounding just like Rachel does when she has had enough, replied "Is this some kind of joke?" David feeling confused said "Uh, give me a Caffe Latte then."

The real Rachel had an idea about what was going on and said "Could we have a menu as well?" The waitress handed them a small menu and left to go get their drinks.

David said "Why wouldn't she know what a Cappucino is?"

Rachel looking over the menu, laughed and replied "Well since everyone is now a clone of me, and I hate cappucinos, I guess they no longer exist. Take a look at the menu, it only contains drinks that I like."

The waitress returned with their drinks, but David did not seem too excited about drinking a Caffe Latte. "Man, I hate this stuff, it's such a girly drink." Amanda just look at him and laughed - "Try it you big baby, since you are now a clone of Rachel, I'll bet you'll end up loving it."

David sheepishly took a sip, and by the expression on his face it was obvious that Amanda was right.

The real Rachel noticed another group of clones. She guessed it was a family, judging by their outfits. They appeared to be a mother and father with two kids, a boy and a girl. The mother Rachel was wiping ice-cream off the son Rachel's mouth.

"Mummy, I have to go." said the daughter Rachel.
"Okay. Rachel, could you stay and finish cleaning Rachel up?", said the mother Rachel, asking the father Rachel to continue her duty.
"Sure, Rachel." said the father Rachel.

"I think this reality affects taste and opinions, but not knowledge and experience," said the real Rachel.

Adults in their 20's will appear 10, adults in their 30's will appear 9, etc. Elderly people will be regressed to babies and toddlers, and vic versa. Early teens will appear around 18, late teens will appear around 12, etc. However, mental states will not be affected."

20's - 10

Amanda then selected "Whole Body". She then looked up at her hands. The change seemed almost instantaneous. She looked around to see Rachel and David regressed to ten-year-olds. Their clothes had shrunk to fit them as well.

"Whoa, cool! It's like I'm a kid, but I still have my adult memories," said David. "Like last night, we did it. Remember?"
"Hehe, yeah." chuckled Rachel.
"I don't think you'll be doing anymore of it in this reality", said Amanda. "Unless..."

She rushed to her bedroom to get a book about human reproduction. She had a read.

"Oh. Seems like kids are the ones who can have sex, get pregnant, and stuff like that. Childbirth must be even more painful in this reality."
"I should use this when I have to babysit my cousin," said Rachel. "It can transform just individuals, right?"

12.content:
Upon awaking, Amanda examined the large array of buttons available on the supposed "Reality Warping" device. While she didn't normally believe in this sort of thing, there was something about this device that gave her a sense of power. She could see that there were buttons for a variety of different effects. Clicking on one, she was suddenly face-to-face with a huge drop down list of things that could be affected, people who could be affected, extra options such as wether they recognize the changes or not, wether or not everyone was affected, whether it affect animals or not. The list went on and on.

She closed the menu without pressing anything. 'Okay,' she thought, 'there has to be an easier way then scrolling through all of the possible options.' She reached over to the letter and found an additional insert that explained the basics of using the device.

If you are reading this, you're probably wondering how this device works. It's easy! Simply press an effect, the corresponding additional effects, and who you wish to affect, and everyone on the list will gain those effects. If this is too complicated, you can always turn on simplicity mode in the main menu, which will narrow down the additional options and only ask to change people that you know. Alternatively, you can enter command mode on the main menu to simply write in what you explicitly wish to happen and to whom, and the proper effect will be applied. As an additional alternative, you can mount the device to any available surface in your home, and the effects will only change reality around the house, and leaving said building will remove any effects in place on the building.

Excited to test out the device, Amanda placed the device onto the nearest wall. She freaked out a little when the device slipped through her hand, as it appeared to turn into liquid, but then it reformed on her wall, looking as if it had been planted in there when they had built the place.

Amanda took this opportunity now to look fully over the list of options available to her through this device. There was an option for almost everything imaginable, including a randomized setting (which she knew she would have to try out later). On the first few pages alone, she found buttons to swap body parts, add body parts, remove body parts, morph body parts, change history, change personalities, change time, rewrite the laws of physics, grant superpowers, mangle with family trees, create new life, explode the universe and start anew, travel to dimensions unknown. You name it, it was on this device.

'With this device, I could do literally anything I want!' Amanda thought, new ideas forming in her head on what she could do. 'But first, I should probably actually choose something to change before assuming this device has this much power.'

She wondered what on the menu would be normal enough that it may have gone unnoticed if this actually did all the stuff it said it did. Scrolling through the variety of options, she eventually decided upon adding an additional body part. She scrolled through the options, choosing the smallest noticeable change she could think of, which happened to be adding an extra eye. Upon choosing the specifics, the menu changed to an anatomical design of her body (Which disturbed her, as she had no naked pictures of herself, and this was perfectly correct down to the strange mole she had on her back) and allowed her to pick where on her body she would like to place the eye. Remembering the old Grimm story One-eye, Two-eyes, and Three-eyes (A very interesting tale of a normal, two-eyed middle child proving her superiority over her exotic, one-eyed older sister and younger three-eyed sister) decided to change everyone into triclopses.

Almost immediately Amanda could tell something was up, as her vision was now a bit cross-eyed between her regular set and her extra eye. Thankfully, she had the forethought to attempt this experiment in front of a mirror, and quickly recognized her third eye on her forehead. It looked exactly like her other eyes, but had no tear ducts on either side. She wasn't sure if this was how it regularly was for triclopses, or happened just because she didn't specify enough.

After messing around with her eyes, seeing how looking different ways affected how she saw and how to close each eye independently of the other, she finally felt like she had enough control to examine what else changed in her world. She assumed that Rachel and David would be up, and that if the instruction leaflet was correct, they would believe this was completely normal. Walking into the living room, she saw Rachel sitting on the couch in her nightgown reading a newspaper with her two eyes while she watched morning cartoons with her third one. David was on his laptop, and swiveled his third eye to look at you and say "Good morning sleepyhead."

"Good morning to you too." Amanda said, as she began to pace around the room looking for other changes that might have been caused. She began flipping through the variety of dvd cases that David had lying around the room. Most of the dvd cases that showed people now featured a very prominent third eye, and she found that those that featured cyclopses regularly now featured two-eyed creatures. "So ... notice anything different today?" Amanda asked coyly.

"Not particularly," David said, still looking at his laptop with his regular set of eyes and only looking at you with his third one.
"Are you wearing that new nightshirt we got last week?" Rachel said, focusing her third eye on you, trying to figure out what you meant by something different.
"Oh, nothing," Amanda said glancing out the window, and noticing a jogger standing near the crosswalk with three-eyed sunglasses and a three-eyed dog. Amanda began to freak out, because the device was only supposed to affect those inside of the house. "I'm going to go get the mail," she said, rushing out the door. Rachel and David shared a weird look with their third eyes, but then eventually went back to what they were doing.

Standing outside in nothing but her nightshirt and panties, Amanda attempted to run up to the jogger to ask him if he had noticed the changes, but became dizzy after stepping out onto the deck. She closed her eyes to regain her composure, and suddenly noticed she only had two eyes again. She looked at the jogger, and realized him and his dog were back to normal as well. Looking into the window of her house, she saw Rachel watching cartoons with a newspaper in her lap, and David on his laptop (a.k.a. Their normal Saturday routine) both with only two eyes. She stepped back inside, and was again greeted by the same discomfort in her stomach. Closing her eyes (this time three of them again) she reopened them, and saw that everyone she had seen with two eyes had three eyes once again. 'Whoa,' she thought to herself, 'that device really is magic.'

She rushed back to her room, eager to try more changes once again. She began debating on what to do, and ultimately decided to ...

13.content:
(I took a quite a bit from Tolchok's chapter, but I wanted to insure I didn't change how device worked.)

Amanda got up around 7:30. She wasn't due to leave for the city until around 11:30. Now seemed to be a good time as any other to test out the device. She had to read the documentation firsthand, however.

"To set up your device, mount it on a wall. This will make the device change all reality within your building".


She wondered how she could place it on her wall. There were no holes for screws or nails. The manual didn't seem to specify how to mount it. She guessed the only way to find out how to mount it was to simply place it on her bedroom wall. She placed the device on her wall, which subsequently seemed to turn into liquid. It engulfed the device, but it still felt like a concrete wall to her hands, which did not get engulfed. After a few seconds, the device surfaced, and it appeared to be attached to her wall. It was now turned on. There were several selections.

Invisible
Disappear
Copy
Size...

Copy? She wondered to herself.

She touched the word "Copy" and another screen came up. There were two selections.

Whole body
Separate parts

She pressed the selection "Whole Body" and brought up "Mind and Body and Clothes", "Clothes and Body", and "Body". She read the manual again.

"Reality will change a person's whole body and mind, or just their. For instance, the Mind and Body change, press the word 'Mind and body' once. To change the reality of people's minds, resulting in people looking and acting similarly to the copied target."

Amanda decided to copy the body and clothes of Rachel, and pressed an arrow pointing right near the bottom of the screen. She then pressed the selection "Body and Clothes". The words were then highlighted in green. Amanda found she was now in her best friend's clothes, but She didn't feel too different. Thus, she went into the bathroom, looked in the mirror, and sure enough, she was now Amanda. She could see her body looked identical to Rachel's including her pink night gown. Where her body had once been in her comfortable pajamas, she had a noticeably larger bust, longer hair, and meticulously cared for skin. Her underwear was now replaced with a small wedgie inducing thong. She raised her arms slightly to adjust her underwear and her boobs jiggled. She groaned and now understood Rachel's complaints to her about having large breasts. She rubbed her hands on her face and noticed she no longer had acne scars from her teenage years.

She figured that David and Rachel must be up by now. She went to the living room, and found Rachel, legs spread out sitting on the couch, watching television and adjusting her underwear.

"Morning Amanda", the nightgown said.
"Hey Rachel! This must be weird seeing someone who looks exactly like yourself, but listen, I can explain...", said Amanda.
"Explain what? Also, it's David duh. What do you mean exactly alike?"
"No, I got an alien device, and warped reality."
"Wow, you sound kind of crazy. I'm not exactly as smart as you, but I know that this is what normal people look like."

Amanda looked up at the television. It was showing some Sports news show. All the characters in the show looked like Rachel wearing her usual girly clothes. They were arguing, but it was hard to differentiate who was talking because of their identical voices. There was a DVD case on the table. The people photographed on that were also Rachel.

"Really, we're supposed to look like this?" asked Amanda.
"Sweetie, are you OK? Look outside if you don't believe me," said David.

She looked out onto the road, and could see various people walking down the street. It looked strange, to see her best friend walking and interacting with herself. Amanda then went outside, and as soon as she exited the door frame, she noticed that she was back to her normal form. She could was no longer Rachel. The people outside went from looking like copies of Rachel to their normal male and female selves. She went back inside, and became Rachel again.

"Are you sure we're supposed to look the same?"
"Yes, I mean what else could we even look like?"
"Why don't we take a look outside?"

Amanda grabbed David by the arm and took her outside. They then both reverted to their true, visible form wearing their respective pajamas.

"See?" Amanda said, pointing to various people. "That's our true form."
"Yeah... totally see it."

David went back inside, and reverted to his Rachel form.

"Did you see?"
"Honestly, no I didn't see why you dragged me outside."
"But we became ourselves again"
"No, I don't remember changing form, sorry babe I don't think I get what you're trying to say"

Amanda stormed off to her bedroom. She had a read of the manual.

"Normally, people affected by this change will accept it as if they were always like that. However, you can program it so they can feel the change. Select 'Mind Control', and a list of names will come up. These consist of people who live or work in the building, as well as regular guests. Names highlighted in green will be people affected by the changes, but will not feel it. Press their names and the highlight will be removed, thus making them able to feel the changes."

Amanda...
13.title: Made everyone a clone of someone

choices: Amanda gets a date with Missy
After a night with Missy, the masculum repruducates, and goes to Missy
After beign rejected, Amanda returns to David, but too late
15.content:
As Amanda looked through the menus, the possibilities became greater and greater. As she looked through potential changes, she realized what she wanted to do. The world was about to change its entire view of sex and sexuality! The went through the choices, and as she went deeper, the device seemed to read her mind. When she was ready, she pushed the button, and there was a strange wave that went out from the device and passed over the entire planet!

Just like that Amanda knew that all STDs were a thing of the past. In fact, there were none. But that was only the start. Females no longer had periods, but instead controlled their fertility, and could only get pregnant when they wanted to. Of course, that would have been a big enough change, but that was really only a small change if the rest became true. She walked out into the living room to test it.

David and Rachel were sitting on the couch playing a video game. You sat down next to them and, after you worked up the nerve, you cautiously said, "You know that girl who waitresses down at the Meeting Place? Missy?" They both grunted as they tried to focus on their game. You continued nervously, "I think she is cute, and I think she likes me, but, well..."

As David died, he paused the game, "Oh for crying out loud Amanda! Why don't you just come out with it? She likes sex with males, and you would like to have my masculum. Am I right?" After you shyly nodded, he sighed, "Well, you know I prefer being male, but if it is okay with Rachel, I could let you have it for a while if you want."

Rachel giggled, "It has been a while since I had some girl on girl time with anyone but Amanda, so it is okay with me."

David grinned as he looked at Rachel thinking of that part, "Okay, but you should be warned, I think he is ready to reproducate. If you get stuck with a penis for a while, don't blame me!" He began to undress, let's get it over with so I can get back to my game."

1531.title: Now what do I do?

info.brief_description: A new take on warping reality, written in third person.
info.description:
Amanda is a 23-year-old college student studying biology. She is also a fan of science fiction.

She lives with two other housemates, David and Rachel, who are boyfriend and girlfriend. Rachel, 22, is her best friend, but she is more feminine, and shares Rachel's love of sci-fi only marginally, and understands little about some of the shows and films she watches. David, 24, is a film buff, and has a large collection of DVD's. On Friday nights, the three arrange movie nights, and watch films of their choice.

One night, Amanda is woken up by a bright light outside her window. She goes outside to see what it is, and finds a strange device on the ground. After fiddling with it for a bit, she finds out that it is capable of warping reality in unusual ways. However, only the reality within her building is affected - when she goes outside, her new form reverts to normal. People affected within the reality accept the change as if reality had always been this way, but she programs it so that David and Rachel can be aware of their changes.
